title: AirAsia faces corruption allegations in India
text:
AirAsia faces corruption allegations in India Wednesday, May 30, 2018 - 01:17
Low-cost airline AirAsia has been accused by Indian authorities of corruption and obtaining a license by breaking foreign investment rules. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Low-cost airline AirAsia has been accused by Indian authorities of corruption and obtaining a license by breaking foreign investment rules. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2H5oama
